dct_description_sm: drawn and photographed by the D.O.S. from material supplied by the High Commissioner for Basutoland, the Bechuanaland Protectorate, and Swaziland.
Shows boreholes, river gauging stations, and recording gauges.
dct_creator_sm: Great Britain, Directorate of Overseas Surveys.
Great Britain, High Commission Territories of Basutoland, the Bechuanaland Protectorate, and Swaziland.
